Select Sum(ifNull(BALANCE.AVAILABLE_AMOUNT, 0)) As total_balance_amount
From Billing.BALANCE

Select count(*) As NUMBER_OF_OPEN_INVOICES
From Billing.INVOICE
Where Upper(INVOICE.STATUS) = 'OPEN'

Select Sum(ifNull(PAYMENT.AMOUNT, 0)) As tot_amt
From Billing.PAYMENT

Select count(*) as no_of_open_cases 
From Customer.CASES where upper(status) <> 'CLOSED'

Select CASE_DATE 
From Customer.CASES where upper(status) <> 'CLOSED'

Select count(*) AS NO_OF_CONTRACT 
From Customer.CONTRACT
